Fix anoying message locale error

  1. bash: warning: setlocale: LC_ALL: cannot change locale (de_DE.UTF-8)

Rebuilt locales 

  $ locale-gen

Then Run: 

 export LC_ALL="de_DE.UTF-8"
 sudo locale-gen de_DE.UTF-8

Alternatively 

  dpkg-reconfigure locales

Set to en_ZA.UTF-8
